attributes.action: Review and Recommission report on ethnic disparities as an urgent matter.
attributes.additional_details: BAME HUB-UK NETWORK  believes: that BAME is a single entity that embodies all ethnic minorities; it expresses concerns related to structural and systemic inequalities, injustice and neglect; it  is also empowering and advocating for all BAME communities, their families and their wellbeing and understanding of the nation at large. In BAME HUB-UK NETWORK we don't ask for any special favours but equal opportunities and fair treatment of all that is inclusive of our cultural and religious needs.
attributes.background:
The government should: investigate the validity of the report ; it doesn't reflect the true and real experiences of the BAME communities in the UK;it also doesn't acknowledge the existence of institutional racism;
BAME umbrella term should remain in use as it reflects all ethnic minorities

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Investigate the evidence, production & publication of the Sewell Report: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582842

Disregard the findings and recommendations of the Sewell report: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581907
